Create EFI application¶

gen_efi_app is tool for creating EFI project skeleton.

Developed in python code.

The README is used to introduce the modules and provide instructions on how to install the modules, any machine dependencies it may have and any other information that should be provided before the modules are installed.

Contents

  • Create EFI application
  • gen_efi_app
    • gen_efi_app package
      • Subpackages
        • gen_efi_app.pro package
      • Module contents

Installation¶

Navigate to release page download and extract release archive.

To install this set of modules type the following

tar xvzf gen_efi_app-x.y.z.tar.gz
cd gen_efi_app-x.y.z
#python2
pip install -r requirements.txt
python setup.py install_lib
python setup.py install_egg_info
python setup.py install_data
#python3
pip3 install -r requirements.txt
python3 setup.py install_lib
python3 setup.py install_egg_info
python3 setup.py install_data

You can use Docker to create image/container, or You can use pip to install

#python2
pip install gen_efi_app
#python3
pip3 install gen_efi_app

Dependencies¶

gen_efi_app requires next modules and libraries

  • ats-utilities - Python App/Tool/Script Utilities

Tool structure¶

gen_efi_app is based on OOP

Code structure

gen_efi_app/
├── conf/
│   ├── gen_efi_app.cfg
│   ├── gen_efi_app_util.cfg
│   ├── project.yaml
│   └── template/
│       ├── cflags.template
│       ├── ldflags.template
│       ├── main.template
│       ├── makefile.template
│       ├── objects.template
│       └── ocflags.template
├── __init__.py
├── log/
│   └── gen_efi_app.log
├── pro/
│   ├── config/
│   │   ├── __init__.py
│   │   ├── pro_name.py
│   │   └── template_dir.py
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── read_template.py
│   └── write_template.py
└── run/
    └── gen_efi_app_run.py
